tagBITMAPINFOHEADER Struct Reference

#include <GRRLIB.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

u32 biSize
u32 biWidth
u32 biHeight
u16 biPlanes

u32 biYPelsPerMeter
u32 biClrUsed
u32 biClrImportant

Detailed Description

This structure contains information about the dimensions and color format of a device-independent bitmap (DIB).

Member Data Documentation

u16 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biBitCount

Specifies the number of bits per pixel.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biClrImportant

Specifies the number of color indexes required for displaying the bitmap.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biClrUsed

Specifies the number of color indexes in the color table that are actually used by the bitmap.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biCompression

Specifies the type of compression for a compressed bottom-up bitmap.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biHeight

Specifies the height of the bitmap, in pixels.

u16 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biPlanes

Specifies the number of planes for the target device.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biSize

Specifies the size of the structure, in bytes.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biSizeImage

Specifies the size, in bytes, of the image.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biWidth

Specifies the width of the bitmap, in pixels.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biXPelsPerMeter

Specifies the horizontal resolution, in pixels per meter, of the target device for the bitmap.

u32 tagBITMAPINFOHEADER::biYPelsPerMeter

Specifies the vertical resolution, in pixels per meter, of the target device for the bitmap.
